about_the_game:
Tangling Notes - Ancient Cemetery Palace Series: Yanqing Yin-Jiangyao gown (attached with 2999Ling coin) contains the small and stiff character of complaining Ling-Ancient Cemetery Palace Series costumes: Yanqing Yin-Jiangyao gown, accompanied by the skin to send Ning Ling coin.



Unlock this costume to get the plot "Ancient Cemetery Palace Chapter I Xiaohan Period"

In the old years, when you admire the snow and make an appointment with the monarch for the next year, the monarch shows mercy at will.

In the coming year, if you wash the snow with your husband, who will be the only one who will give up the covenant?
